manipulators.description: Ctrl + U to delete backward from point to the beginning of line.
Ctrl + W to delete word behind point

rules.description: Ctrl + B/F to move between words
Function keys, movement, brightness, volumen and media conntrols
Symbols in upper row, Number row and hard to reach symbols in lower row

manipulators.description: Spacebar to R_CMD on hold, SPC on tap
R_CMD to R_SHIFT on hold, ESC on tap
L_CMD to L_SHIFT (SYMBOLS layer) on hold, SPC on tab
R_ALT on hold, close parenthesis on tap
L_ALT to L_CTRL on hold, open parenthesis on tap
